name: Battle Tank (itch) (CloudDeLuna)
description:
Context

Game developed while/after I followed an Unreal Engine course on Udemy (https://www.udemy.com/share/1000hG/)

Use your mouse/keyboard (WASD or ZQSD) or your gamepad to shoot, move, pick up health packs...

Currently the game has no goal or end reason and is still in development

Engine

This game is developed using Unreal engine 4
